byline.original: By LYDIA POLGREEN and SRUTHI GOTTIPATI

abstract: Can a movement built on disdain for politics can survive the down-and-dirty of Indian political life?
snippet: Can a movement built on disdain for politics can survive the down-and-dirty of Indian political life?
lead_paragraph: There is no question that any deep political engagement among India's rapidly growing middle class is a major threat to the status quo in Indian politics.

headline.main: Will the Middle Class Stick by Team Anna?
